creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
To select a node in the site tab, the user first must select the area they want.
This is a usability issue, as it is quite confusing and tripped me up for about
20 minutes.

Expected behavior:

Delete a page
Hit the + by the Trash
Click on the node representing your deleted page
This doesn't work

To make it work:
Delete a page
Click on Trash
Click on node representing your deleted page

The authoring node doesn't expand when the trash or archive areas are selected.
It looks like it will, then collapses back up. Definitely a confusing usability
error.
